description.ruby-sapphire:
A 5-turn attack that gains
power on successive hits.
description.emerald:
A 5-turn attack that gains
power on successive hits.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A 5-turn rolling
attack that becomes
stronger each time
it rolls.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user continually
rolls into the foe
over five turns. It
becomes stronger
each time it hits.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
effect.shortEffect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
